knimeNode.name: Category to class
knimeNode.shortDescription: Adds a class column to each row, containing the category string of the document in that particular row.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows you to add a class column to each row containing a document cell. The value of the class is the document's category. If no category is defined, the class value will be set to "undefined". If more than one category is defined, the first category (of the list of alphabetically ordered categories is used as class value. If the input data table contains no document cells the node can not be executed.

ports.inPort: An input data table containing document cells.
ports.outPort: An output table containing the input data with an additional class column.
